alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 08 at 1:52PM AKDT until April 10 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Northwest winds 15 mph with gusts to 30 mph. Visibility reduced to one half mile or less at times in blowing snow. * WHERE...Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall and northwest winds 15 mph with gusts to 30 mph along the Alaska Highway will produce visibilities of one half mile or less at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
